name: ufront-orm
description: An extension of Haxe's sys.db classes that provide relationships (foreign keys), validation, client-side safety and more.
releasenote:
Fixes for serialization of ManyToMany relationship on client.
Reinstate our patched `sys.db.Manager` - until 3.2 lands this is still needed to overcome https://github.com/HaxeFoundation/haxe/pull/2692
